p: However, at this time, there are no cannabis-derived products approved by the USFDA for use in animals. Although, the aforementioned products approved by USFDA for human use can be used in animals by veterinarians under the Animal Medicinal Drug Use Clarification Actâ€”AMDUCA of 1994, [ 68] products that have not been approved by USFDA (which includes the majority of products currently being marketed) are not available for use under AMDUCA.
